text: “ohuge anumætiya laba gat aya hæra, (an kisima malayikavarayekuta ho) ohu veta mædihat vi kata kirimehi prayojanayak at vanne næta. (allahge yamkisi niyogayaknikmena vita, ovun biya vi vevlannaha). ovunge hrdayanhi tibi vevlima paha vi giya vahama (ovungen keneku anit ayata)“obage deviyan kumana niyogayak nikut kaleda?”yi vimasannaha.eyata anit aya “(nikut kala yutu) satyaya (vu niyogayan)ma nikut kaleya. ohu nam, itamat usasvantayeku ha itamatvisalavantayekuda vanneya” yayi pavasannaha
